numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Different countries have different usage rates of energy sources.
2. I wonder whether the trend toward cleaner energy sources will continue at this rate.
3. I also wonder whether the trend will change in the near future.
5. A change to cleaner power sources would benefit the environment.
6. It depends on whether we can maintain cleaner power sources in a sustainable way.
7. If we cannot maintain cleaner power sources in a sustainable way then we will struggle.
8. The headline is: The progress in Energy Around the World.
